page1.title: Change the Way You See the Game
page1.slogan: {website.name} helps athletes, teams, coaches and communities get the most out of every moment.

cards.title: Titan GPS Joins
cards.description: A full view of athlete performance–combining physical metrics, video, and stats for all levels in one powerful ecosystem.

cards.title: Watch Live Games and Highlights
cards.description: Your favorite athletes and teams are all on  this platform — from livestreams to can't-miss moments.

cards.title: See Your Sport Differently
cards.description: When it comes to data, analytics and performance analysis, it delivers more solutions for more sports.

page3.title: The Trusted Sports Technology Platform for Performance
page3.description: We provide the best video with instant analysis and insights everyone can actually use. This is how we run organizations at every level of sport.

page4.title: Connect With Athletes, Teams and Communities
page4.description: Looking to follow your favorite athlete or team? Whether it's scores, schedules, stats, livestreams or anything in between... it's on {website.name}.

page6.title: We believe in sports. And teams believe in us.

testimonials.name: Lewis Macmillan
testimonials.role: Head of Player Insights, Fulham FC
testimonials.quote: By partnering with us, our idea of an integrated, efficient, holistic approach to athlete data analysis can be realized. We see this as a big step forward.

testimonials.name: Quentin White
testimonials.quote: It really affords me more time to do my job better when I have this one-stop shop.
